title: Romance isn't Dead
body:
A hotspot for both sims looking for love and with serious commitment issues, this property type is usually populated by those willing to have a bit more 'fun'. You should expect people to roleplay a little here, so don't take anyone's comments about their 'snakes' too literally. This lot category's main benefits are doubled increases and decreases in relationships (due to the sexual tension, obviously) and the Heart Beds and Hot Tub, which can be used for... well, you figure it out. 

Motives: [s][color=#B3FF99]Easy[/color][/s], Speciality: [s]Love Beds, Heart Hot Tub[/s] 
[s][color=white]Overfill: 100% Social, Relationships: 2x Multiplier[/color][/s]
[s][color=#FF9999]Skills are always disabled on this property category for visitors.[/color][/s]
